entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gods Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
